t: Michele's Granola
s: I have tried many brands of granola over the years but Michele's Almond Butter granola is the best!!! First of all, the flavor is awesome and it's crunchy without being too hard on your teeth, so delicious!!! I absolutely love it! Thanks to the workers at Michele's Granola for making a great product.
